name: Aberrant Spirit (UA)
languages: Deep Speech, understands the languages you speak

trait.name: Hit Points
text: equal the aberration's Constitution modifier + your spellcasting ability modifier + ten times the spell's level

trait.name: Regeneration (Slaadi Only)
text: The aberration regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Whispering Aura (Star Spawn Only)
text: At the start of each of the aberration's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or take 3d6 psychic damage, provided that the aberration isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The aberration makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Eye Ray (Beholderkin Only)
text: Ranged Spell Attack: +3 + the spell's level to hit, range 30 ft., one creature. 1d8 + 3 + the spell's level psychic damage.

action.name: Claws (Slaadi Only)
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 + the spell's level to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d10 + 3 + the spell's level slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points until the start of the aberration's next turn.

action.name: Psychic Slam (Star Spawn Only)
text: Melee Spell Attack: +3 + the spell's level to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 1d6 + 3 + the spell's level psychic damage.

description: Source: Unearthed Arcana: 2020 Spells And Magic Tattoos p. 3
